subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
But Donny isn't making public statements about his care for the
environment. I can see hypocrisy by Kate by making statements
about caring for the environment, then living in a large property.

Maybe Kate's carbon footprint is not as big as it could be without
efforts she does, but I'd guess that Kate makes a bigger absolute
carbon footprint than Donny just from heating/cooling her place
and all the electricity usage from cameras, video, etc.

yellowmattercustard wrote:
> Donny Bravo wrote:
> 
>>> And what have you done to decrease your carbon footprint?
> 
> 
>> When the celebrities and politicians who claim to care passionately 
>> about the issue get down to my level, I'll consider taking them 
>> seriously.
> 
> Just as I thought. Nothing!
> 
> Everyone wants to keep passing the buck, and play the blame game.
> 
> Great.
> 
> I wonder, have any of the lh's made a concerted effort to reduce their 
> carbon footprint?
